text: Kendall Jenner. Photo : Anthony Ghnassia / Getty Images for Longchamp Kendall Jenner is the face of a new range of hair - styling tools called Runway Series from California - based brand Formawell Beauty, reports WWD. Jenner lends her face ( via campaign imagery ) and name ( via a ` ` Formawell Beauty x Kendall Jenner'' subtitle ) to the line, which includes a flat iron, ionic blow - dryer and curling iron. The products in the line include a blow - dryer, flatiron, curling iron and several brushes with prices ranging from $ 14. 99 to $ 119 ; they are already available at FormawellBeauty. com and will also be sold at department, specialty and mass retailers.
